name: 3aw-backend
description: Site and content management system for Cedae Saude, written with CakePHP.
author: Samuel Levy

scripts.install-template: cd plugins/Site && git clone git@bitbucket.org:3avinicius/cedae2.git frontend && cd frontend && yarn install && gulp build
scripts.update-template: cd plugins/Site/frontend && git pull && yarn install && gulp build
